ygData.subject: Re: About Intel. and learning.....................
ygData.msgSnippet: Shammys need more wis than int. Int is for pure caster classes ... priest classes (shammy, dru, cleric)use Wis. If you want to focus on something besides your
ygData.messageBody:
Shammys need more wis than int. Int is for pure caster classes ...
priest classes (shammy, dru, cleric)use Wis. If you want to focus on
something besides your melee skills put points into , and buy armor
with Wis stats. The arms you bought was a good way to go.

Laurylle Soulsdesire
26 Cleric of Tunare
Morrel Thule

>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <wolffmanus@y...>
> To: <EQCheats@yahoogroups.com>
> Sent: Saturday, January 18, 2003 7:27 PM
> Subject: [EQCheats] About Intel. and learning.....................
>
>
> > I am working up a Bar. Shaman and have made it so far to 12th
level,
> > the starting Intel. is 60 for the class/race. I Got a really great
> > set of arms (Giant scalemail arms) it give +3 wis, +20 hps -3 int
> > which reduces my intel to 57. I Juat got a Good spear for my class
> > and level and am trying to learn it up in skill levels, I have
added
> > 10 points to Pierceing and been stabing the "Heck" out of
anything I
> > con Light Blue or higher and have not gone up one poing in
pierceing.
> > Now to what I wanted to know.....
> >
> > Does the Dif. between an intel. of 60 and that of 57 make any
change
> > in how well I Learn skills with use? If so then I have a great
set of
> > arms that a spell slinger can use on the server I am on and if not
> > then how high do I need to raise my Intel to learn quicker?
> >
> > Thanks..
> >
